00027 class ExpandStringLane {
00028    public:
00032       enum laneDirection {
00034          no_dir = 0,
00036          sharp_left = (1<<1),
00038          left = (1<<2),
00040          half_left = (1<<3),
00042          ahead = (1<<4),
00044          half_right = (1<<5),
00046          right = (1<<6),
00048          sharp_right = (1<<7),
00050          uturn_left = (1<<8),
00052          uturn_right = (1<<9),
00053 
00057          opposite_direction = (1<<13),
00058 
00060          preferred_lane = (1<<14),
00065          not_car_lane = (1<<15),
00066       };
00067 
00073       ExpandStringLane( uint16 directions, bool preferredLane,
00074                         bool notCarLane );
00075 
00079       ExpandStringLane();
00080 
00084       uint16 getDirections() const;
00085 
00086 
00090       laneDirection getSingleDirection() const;
00091 
00095       static laneDirection getSingleDirection( uint16 dir );
00096 
00102       laneDirection getSingleDirectionUsingTurn( uint32 turn ) const;
00103 
00107       bool getPreferred() const;
00108 
00112       bool getNotCar() const;
00113 
00117       void load( const Packet* p, int& pos );
00118 
00122       void save( Packet* p, int& pos ) const;
00123 
00127       static uint32 getSizeInPacket();
00128 
00132       void dump( ostream& out ) const;
00133 
00137       static const char* laneDirectionToString( laneDirection d );
00138 
00142       inline friend ostream& operator << ( 
00143          ostream& os, const ExpandStringLane& s )
00144       {
00145          s.dump( os );
00146          return os;
00147       }
00148 
00149    private:
00153       uint16 m_dir;
00154 };

00264 // =======================================================================
00265 //                                     Implementation of inlined methods =

00267 
00268 inline 
00269 ExpandStringLane::ExpandStringLane( uint16 directions, bool preferredLane,
00270                                     bool notCarLane )
00271 {
00272    m_dir = directions;
00273    if ( preferredLane ) {
00274       m_dir |= preferred_lane;
00275    }
00276    if ( notCarLane ) {
00277       m_dir |= not_car_lane;
00278    }
00279 }
00280 
00281 inline 
00282 ExpandStringLane::ExpandStringLane() {
00283    m_dir = 0;
00284 }
00285 
00286 inline uint16
00287 ExpandStringLane::getDirections() const {
00288    return m_dir; // Remove preferred and no car bits? Not absolutely needed.
00289 }
00290 
00291 inline bool
00292 ExpandStringLane::getPreferred() const {
00293    return (m_dir & preferred_lane );
00294 }
00295 
00296 inline bool
00297 ExpandStringLane::getNotCar() const {
00298    return (m_dir & not_car_lane );
00299 }
00300 
00301 inline uint32
00302 ExpandStringLane::getSizeInPacket() {
00303    return 2/*Each lane is an uint16*/;
00304 }
00305 
00306 
00307 inline
00308 ExpandStringLanes::ExpandStringLanes( bool stopOfLanes ) 
00309       : m_dist( 0 ), m_stopOfLanes( stopOfLanes )
00310 {
00311 }
00312 
00313 inline uint32
00314 ExpandStringLanes::getSizeInPacket() const {
00315    return 2*4/*dist+nbrlanes*/ + 
00316       size() * ExpandStringLane::getSizeInPacket() + 3/*Possible padding*/;
00317 }
00318 
00319 inline uint32
00320 ExpandStringLanes::getDist() const {
00321    return m_dist;
00322 }
00323 
00324 inline void
00325 ExpandStringLanes::setDist( uint32 d ) {
00326    m_dist = d;
00327 }
00328 
00329 inline void
00330 ExpandStringLanes::addLane( const ExpandStringLane& l ) {
00331    push_back( l );
00332 }
00333 
00334 inline bool
00335 ExpandStringLanes::getStopOfLanes() const {
00336    return m_stopOfLanes;
00337 }

00339 inline void
00340 ExpandStringLanesCont::addLaneGroup( const ExpandStringLanes& l ) {
00341    push_back( l );
00342 }
00343 
00344 inline void
00345 ExpandStringLanesCont::addLaneGroupFirst( const ExpandStringLanes& l ) {
00346    insert( begin(), l );
00347 }
